categories: Category:The Official Star Wars Fact File

nodes.text: The Official Star Wars Fact File 7

The Official Star Wars Fact File 7 was the seventh issue of The Official Star Wars Fact File, released on February 13, 2002. The issue was authored by Darren Allanson, Andrew Darling, Chris Gardner, Iain Lowson and Jim Swallow. It also featured original artwork by Carl Lyons and Tig Sutton.

The Sabacc article includes original artwork depicting Lando Calrissian by Carl Lyons on SAB 1, while the second page of the article includes orriginal art work depicting a set of four Sabacc cards by Tig Sutton.
